solution.name: Modern Script Editor web part by MikaelSvenson

features.title: Modern Script Editor Web Part Feature
features.description: The feature that activates ScriptEditorWebPart from the pnp-script-editor solution.

shortDescription.default: This web part is similar to the classic Script Editor Web Part, and allows you do drop arbitrary script or html on a modern page.

longDescription.default: Coming from old classic SharePoint pages you might have existing script solutions you want to re-use on a modern page without having to repackage it as a new SharePoint Framework web part. This web part is similar to the classic Script Editor Web Part, and allows you do drop arbitrary script or html on a modern page.
